ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Guild Loot Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t these weapons and armors pass down the line when they get new ones? ... From: Cranfill, Wendy  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Don't these weapons and armors pass down the line when they get new ones?

----- Original Message -----
From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 3:11 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guild Loot Rules


> Honestly for me its because since the release of Kunark and Velious, I've
> seen our warriors and rogues outfitted in a dozen or more different
weapons
> each, approximately 3 sets of new armor and a dozen "uber" items while the
> casters (especially int casters) sit around in jumpy and mana robes (which
> in case you dont know really aren't goo). In our guild, Bards fall along
> the same lines, they aren't considered "important" enough to go in on the
> tank items so end up getting pretty much squat for their time and effort.
> After a few months, its gets frustrating.
>
> Halana/Tani
> Solusek Ro
